title: Hextech Crafting and empty promises
body:
Hextech Crafting was just enabled on EUW & EUNE.  
A [Riot employee](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-66-notes) assured us that we would get this feature at the same time as the rest of the servers, if not sooner due to timezones.  
Yet again, it feels like OCE gets the short end of the stick as the server with(IMO) the most toxic general playerbase, fewer game options(TT on weekends, never had DOM etc.) and the least ability to participate in events that Riots fave servers get to(NA, EU and Korea) such as the Fire/Ice event.  
  
I am trying really hard to keep this post civil, given how often it feels that Riot Games as dubbed OCE the unimportant forgotten child {{champion:32}}
